page.title: 05Ministry of Defence
page.content: For the length of Boundary Lane the Ministry of Defence owns much land.It is private land.No member of the public is allowed on the land without permission.Workers at the site have passes to enter the site and have signed the official secrets act. The Ministry of Defence have used the site for nearly 40 years.The Ministry of Defence needed a site to test vehicles.As specially adapted vehicles were being made at Christchurch the Hurn site was chosen. At Hurn site,apart from testing army vehicles,civilian vehicles are tested.
